alert.note: Alert for Greer; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:17AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Comanche, southwestern Caddo, eastern Jackson, Kiowa, northwestern Tillman and east central Greer Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 717 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Mountain View to 5 miles northwest of Warren. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altus, Elgin, Snyder, Tipton, Blair, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Roosevelt, Headrick, Friendship, Cooperton, Altus Air Force Base, Meers, Tom Steed Reservoir, Lake Lawtonka, Warren, Humphreys, southern Lake Ellsworth, and Fort Sill. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 47 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
